title: MANGO-BANANA & VANILLA BREAKFAST DREAM
directions: add the granola into your breakfast jar.
mix the yogurt with the vanilla extract and honey and add on top of the granola.
peel the mango and cut into small chunks, set aside and start making the bananaicecream.
add all the ingredients into a blender and blend to a thick and creamy mixture.
mix 1/3 of the nanaicecream with 1 tsp of Sea Buckthorn Powder and add on top of the yogurt. (if you don’t have Sea Buckthorn Powder simply add 1/3 of the nanaicecream on top of the yogurt.)
now add the mango chunks and top with the remaining bananaicecream.

sprinkle the rest of the Sea Buckthorn powder on top (or you might as well sprinkle some nuts of choice or some more granola on top) enjoooooy and don’t forget about the 10% ORGANIC BURST discount! :)
ingredients: 3 tbsp crunchy granola (use your favorite but make sure it’s sugarfree)
2 tsp stevia sugar (or other sweetener of choice)
2 tsp Arctic Berries Sea Buckthorn Powder
